mapper.select: SELECT DT, MBRSEQ, CAMPAIGNSEQ , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE) END) as EXPOSE , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE_SPAM) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE_SPAM) END) as EXPOSE_SPAM , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE_EXT) END) as EXPOSE_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE_TEL) END) as EXPOSE_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK) END) as CLICK , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK_SPAM) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK_SPAM) END) as CLICK_SPAM , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK_EXT) END) as CLICK_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK_TEL) END) as CLICK_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASH) END) as BIZCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASH_EXT) END) as BIZCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASH_TEL) END) as BIZCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASHTAX) END) as BIZCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASHTAX_EXT) END) as BIZCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASHTAX_TEL) END) as BIZCASHTAX_TELSPAM , (CASE WHEN SUM(EVENTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EVENTCASH) END) as EVENTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(EVENTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EVENTCASH_EXT) END) as EVENTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(EVENTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EVENTCASH_TEL) END) as EVENTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASH) END) as POSTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASH_EXT) END) as POSTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASH_TEL) END) as POSTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX) END) as POSTCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX_EXT) END) as POSTCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX_TEL) END) as POSTCASHTAX_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_EXT) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_TEL) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_EXT) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_TEL) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(DIRECTCNT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(DIRECTCNT) END) as DIRECTCNT , (CASE WHEN SUM(DIRECTAMT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(DIRECTAMT) END) as DIRECTAMT , (CASE WHEN SUM(INDIRECTCNT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(INDIRECTCNT) END) as INDIRECTCNT , (CASE WHEN SUM(INDIRECTAMT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(INDIRECTAMT) END) as INDIRECTAMT FROM REALTIME_SA_MEMBER_REPORT WHERE DT = #{dt} and MBRSEQ = #{mbrSeq} GROUP BY DT, MBRSEQ, CAMPAIGNSEQ

SELECT DT, MBRSEQ, CAMPAIGNSEQ, ADGROUPSEQ , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE) END) as EXPOSE , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE_SPAM) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE_SPAM) END) as EXPOSE_SPAM , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE_EXT) END) as EXPOSE_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(EXPOSE_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EXPOSE_TEL) END) as EXPOSE_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK) END) as CLICK , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK_SPAM) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK_SPAM) END) as CLICK_SPAM , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK_EXT) END) as CLICK_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CLICK_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CLICK_TEL) END) as CLICK_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASH) END) as BIZCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASH_EXT) END) as BIZCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASH_TEL) END) as BIZCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASHTAX) END) as BIZCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASHTAX_EXT) END) as BIZCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(BIZCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(BIZCASHTAX_TEL) END) as BIZCASHTAX_TELSPAM , (CASE WHEN SUM(EVENTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EVENTCASH) END) as EVENTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(EVENTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EVENTCASH_EXT) END) as EVENTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(EVENTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(EVENTCASH_TEL) END) as EVENTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASH) END) as POSTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASH_EXT) END) as POSTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASH_TEL) END) as POSTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX) END) as POSTCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX_EXT) END) as POSTCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX_TEL) END) as POSTCASHTAX_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_EXT) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_TEL) END) as CANCEL_BIZCASHTAX_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_EXT) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_TEL) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASHTAX_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(DIRECTCNT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(DIRECTCNT) END) as DIRECTCNT , (CASE WHEN SUM(DIRECTAMT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(DIRECTAMT) END) as DIRECTAMT , (CASE WHEN SUM(INDIRECTCNT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(INDIRECTCNT) END) as INDIRECTCNT , (CASE WHEN SUM(INDIRECTAMT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(INDIRECTAMT) END) as INDIRECTAMT FROM REALTIME_SA_MEMBER_REPORT WHERE DT = #{dt} and MBRSEQ = #{mbrSeq} and CAMPAIGNSEQ = #{campaignSeq} GROUP BY DT, MBRSEQ, CAMPAIGNSEQ, ADGROUPSEQ

SUM(POSTCASHTAX) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX) END) as POSTCASHTAX , (CASE WHEN SUM(POSTCASHTAX_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(POSTCASHTAX_EXT) END) as POSTCASHTAX_EXT , (CASE WHEN CANCEL_EVENTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL) END) as CANCEL_EVENTCASH_TEL , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT) is null THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT) END) as CANCEL_POSTCASH_EXT , (CASE WHEN SUM(CANCEL_POSTCASH_TEL) is
